interaction.meta.command.query.result:
§5Query successful!§r Showing information for Region: 
§e{0}§r (ID: §6{1}§r), total area: §a{2} m²§r
§e/imyvmWorldGeo select start
  §fStart selecting positions with a command block.

§e/imyvmWorldGeo select reset
  §fClear all selected points but keep selection mode active.
interaction.meta.command.help.region.cre:
§a/imyvmWorldGeo create <§bshapeType§a> [§bname§a]
  §fCreate a region of the given shape (§brectangle§f, §bcircle§f, §bpolygon§f) from selected positions.
  §fOptionally give it a name.
interaction.meta.command.help.region.del:
§c/imyvmWorldGeo delete <§bregionIdentifier§c>
  §fDelete a region by its ID or name.
interaction.meta.command.help.scope.add:
§d/imyvmWorldGeo addScope <§bshapeType§d> <§bregionIdentifier§d> [§bscopeName§d]
  §fAdd a new scope to the region with the given shape and optional scope name.
interaction.meta.command.help.scope.modi:
§d/imyvmWorldGeo modifyScope <§bregionIdentifier§d> <§bscopeName§d> [§bnewName§d]
  §fModify a scope's properties or rename it.
interaction.meta.command.help.scope.dele:
§d/imyvmWorldGeo deleteScope <§bregionIdentifier§d> <§bscopeName§d>
  §fDelete a scope from a region.
interaction.meta.command.help.tp.set:
§b/imyvmWorldGeo teleportPoint set [§bx§b] [§by§b] [§bz§b]
  §fSet the teleport point for the current region and scope.
  §7- If coords are valid, sets to specified location.
  §7- If omitted, defaults to player's current position.
interaction.meta.command.help.tp.reset:
§b/imyvmWorldGeo teleportPoint reset <§bregionIdentifier§b> <§bscopeName§b>
  §fReset the teleport point for the specified scope.
  §7- Defaults to current scope if args are omitted.
interaction.meta.command.help.tp.inquiry:
§b/imyvmWorldGeo teleportPoint inquiry <§bregionIdentifier§b> <§bscopeName§b>
  §fInquire about the teleport point for the specified scope.
  §7- Defaults to current scope if args are omitted.
interaction.meta.command.help.tp.telepor:
§b/imyvmWorldGeo teleport <§bregionIdentifier§b> <§bscopeName§b>
  §fTeleport the player to the teleport point of the specified region and scope.
interaction.meta.command.help.tp.toggle:
§b/imyvmWorldGeo teleportPoint toggle <§bregionIdentifier§b> <§bscopeName§b>
  §fToggle the accessibility of the teleport point for the specified scope.
interaction.meta.command.help.setting.ad:
§9/imyvmWorldGeo setting add <§bregionIdentifier§9> <§bkey§9> <§bvalue§9> [§bplayerName§9]
  §fAdd a setting to a region, optionally for a specific player.
interaction.meta.command.help.setting.re:
§9/imyvmWorldGeo setting remove <§bregionIdentifier§9> <§bkey§9> [§bplayerName§9]
  §fRemove a setting from a region, optionally for a specific player.
interaction.meta.command.help.setting.qu:
§9/imyvmWorldGeo setting queryValue <§bregionIdentifier§9> <§bkey§9> [§bplayerName§9]
  §fQuery the value of a setting in a region, optionally for a specific player.
interaction.meta.command.help.setting_sc:
§5/imyvmWorldGeo settingScope add <§bregionIdentifier§5> <§bscopeName§5> <§bkey§5> <§bvalue§5> [§bplayerName§5]
  §fAdd a setting to a specific scope of a region, optionally for a specific player.

§5/imyvmWorldGeo settingScope remove <§bregionIdentifier§5> <§bscopeName§5> <§bkey§5> [§bplayerName§5]
  §fRemove a setting from a specific scope, optionally for a specific player.

§5/imyvmWorldGeo settingScope queryValue <§bregionIdentifier§5> <§bscopeName§5> <§bkey§5> [§bplayerName§5]
  §fQuery the value of a setting in a specific scope, optionally for a specific player.
interaction.meta.command.help.info.query:
§6/imyvmWorldGeo query <§bregionIdentifier§6>
  §fShow detailed information about a region.
interaction.meta.command.help.info.toggl:
§6/imyvmWorldGeo toggle
  §fToggle the action bar display for regions.
error.duplicated_points: Cannot create a region with duplicated points.
error.insufficient_points: You must select enough points for a {0} region.
error.coincident_points: For a rectangle, the first two points must not share the same X or Z coordinate.
error.rectangle_too_small: The rectangle is too small. It must meet the minimum side length and area requirements.
error.circle_too_small: The circle is too small. The radius must be at least the minimum size.
error.polygon_too_small: The polygon is too small. The area must be at least the minimum size.
error.under_bounding_box_limit: The region is under the bounding box limit, which implies its x span or z span is too small.
error.aspect_ratio_invalid: The region's aspect ratio exceeds the maximum allowed limit, we disallow the existence of a Chile-ly region.
error.edge_too_short: One or more edges of the polygon are too short. Each edge must be at least the minimum length.
error.intersection_between_scopes: The new region intersects with an existing region's scope.

scoreboard.scope.none.name: -Free to use-
